permission.dtvPostpaidDashboardResolutionBody: Please make sure calendar access is enabled in settings.
permission.loyaltyExplanationBody: Allow permission access storage to set up your account and profile picture.
permission.loyaltyResolutionBody: Please make sure storage access is enabled in setting
permission.editMyProfileExplanationBody: Allow permission to access camera and storage to set up your account and profile picture.
permission.editMyProfileResolutionBody: Please make sure camera and storage access is enabled in settings.
permission.networkCoverageExplanationBody: Allow permission to access location to show you the nearby outlets.
permission.networkCoverageResolutionBody: Please make sure location access is enabled in settings.

permission.locateUsResolutionBody: Please make sure location access is enabled in settings.
permission.helpFriendExplanationBody: Allow permission to access contact to find friends from your contact list.
permission.helpFriendResolutionBody: Please make sure contact access is enabled in settings.
permission.qrCodeExplanationBody: Allow permission to access camera on your device to scan.
permission.qrCodeResolutionBody: Please make sure camera access is enabled in settings.
permission.sharableDataPackExplanationBody: Allow permission to access contact to add members from your contact list.

permission.cameraGeneralExplanationBody: Allow permission to access camera on your device
permission.cameraGeneralResolutionBody: Please make sure camera access is enabled in settings.
permission.galleryGeneralExplanationBody: Allow permission access storage to access image library.
permission.galleryGeneralResolutionBody: Please make sure storage access is enabled in setting

walkThrough.subTitle1: Manage all your Dialog connections instantly from anywhere, anytime at your fingertips.
walkThrough.title2: Keep an eye on your usage
walkThrough.subTitle2: MyDialog lets you know your usage, whether it be your calls, SMS, or data.
walkThrough.subTitle3: Use the MyDialog app to activate and manage your main, data, combo, voice, IDD & roaming packages.
walkThrough.subTitle4: Take control of your online connectivity. Use the MyDialog app to activate and manage your internet data packages anywhere, anytime.
walkThrough.subTitle5: MyDialog lets you make payments, and activate TV channels, packages and rescans, conveniently from your own home.
